title: ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. I...
